prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Wright family genealogical charts. Accession 42223. Genealogical notes collection, The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Virginia.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: These items came in a transfer of court papers from the city of Lynchburg.

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: The genealogical charts were exhibits in the chancery case, Betsy Wright and others versus the Administrator of Sylvia Wright and others, heard in the City of Lynchburg Circuit Court.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Includes information on the descendants of Sylvia Wright, a slave who had children by her owner Thomas Wright. She was a resident of Campbell County. An additional surname mentioned: Turner.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Additional genealogical information related to the Wright family line can be found in the chancery case Betsy Wright and others versus the Administrator of Sylvia Wright and others (City of Lynchburg Chancery Cause 1873-014.)
